r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: * PCBC-722: Fix boolean search query encoding * PCBC-703: Add support for query with FlexIndex (FTS) * PCBC-719: Enhance user management for collections * PCBC-702: Implement geopolygon FTS query * PCBC-705: Update eviction policy types. Now it covers ephemeral buckets * PCBC-721: Allow to fallback to bucket connection for older servers
